overview.en: MILK is the Pass of Purcow Digital Assets Service Community. There is no reservation, no private placement, 100% fair mining, it is the incentive mechanism for the community to achieve autonomy, and it is also the right to the community's corresponding rights and interests; 92% of the community's income dividend will be distributed to MILK's locker holder.
overview.zh: MILK 是 Purcow 紫牛数字资产服务社区通证，没有预留，没有私募，100%公平挖矿产生，是社区实现自治的激励机制，是社区相应权益的权证；社区92%的收入分红给MILK锁仓持有者。
